com.poesys.db.connection

Interface IJdbcDriver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JtdsDriver, MySqlDriver, OracleDriver

    public interface IJdbcDriver
    An interface for a JDBC driver factory; this interface is an abstract factory that allows setting various components, then generates a valid URL from the components and a valid driver name. Implementations must implement the correct form for a specific JDBC driver and must code the standard driver name, usually as a constant.
    Author:
    Robert J. Muller
